mapper.select: SELECT r.*, d.*, p.*, b.* FROM reserve r JOIN dog d ON r.dogNo = d.dogNo JOIN rsPrice rp ON r.rsNo = rp.rsNo JOIN price p ON rp.priceNo = p.priceNo JOIN beautylist b ON p.beautyNo = b.beautyNo WHERE r.bNo = #{bNo};
mapper.update: UPDATE reserve SET attitude = #{attitude}, rCondition = #{rCondition}, tangle = #{tangle}, disliked = #{disliked}, bath = #{bath}, message = #{message}, curruntWeight = #{curruntWeight} WHERE rsNo = #{rsNo};
